channel.title: Help! 508 webclient !chance 127.0.0.1
channel.description:
hi, I have 508 a client and server. and I want gladly a web client. that has succeeded by this site http://www.google.com/forums/showthread.php?p=157898 but I gladly want that changed to Therichguards.no-ip.info but he puts the ip it automatically to 127.0.0.1 how changes I this?
thanks
grtzz rsdragonboy

item.title: Help! 508 webclient !chance 127.0.0.1
item.dc:creator: @I_Use_RSBot I_Use_RSBot
item.description:
@I_Use_RSBot wrote:

Go to your client folder and search client.java and try to find thisClass68_Sub9.aString2883 = "127.0.0.1";
And change 127.0.0.1 to your ip. Remember to keep quotes
